Verses: 1 dhevane, Boomiyil Ummudaiya Vazhiyum, Ellaa Jaadhigalukkullum Ummudaiya Ratchaniyamum Vilangumpadiyaai,
2 dhevareer Engalukku Irangi, Engalai Aaseervadhiththu, Ummudaiya Mugaththai Engalmel Piragaasikkappannum. (selaa.)
3 dhevane, Janangal Ummaith Thudhippaargalaaga; Sagala Janangalum Ummaith Thudhippaargalaaga.
4 dhevareer Janangalai Nidhaanamaai Niyaayantheerththu, Boomiyilulla Jaadhigalai Nadaththuveer; Aadhalaal Jaadhigal Sandhoshiththu, Kembeeraththode Magizhakkadavargal. (selaa.)
5 dhevane, Janangal Ummaith Thudhippaargalaaga; Sagala Janangalum Ummaith Thudhippaargalaaga.
6 boomi Than Balanaith Tharum, Dhevanaagiya Engal Dhevane Engalai Aaseervadhippaar.
7 dhevan Engalai Aaseervadhippaar; Boomiyin Ellaigalellaam Avarukkup Bayandhirukkum.
